item.title: Trobleshooting TCP Connection request time outs
item.description: Background I recently had opportunity to support team who has been battling with Intermittent (scary i know :)) issues with TCP connectivity in Production. Simplified deployment Architecture is as below, High Level Architecture Technology Stack used is Microsoft .NET Framework 4.8 using ODP.NET for Oracle Connectivity (Oracle Server is 8 CPU box). Each of Web Servers in cluster have IIS hosted on it with multiple Applications (Application domains) serving HTTP(s) based traffic.
